chapters.title: Prologue: The First Message
chapters.info: Marigan, p. 17 (8)—Identity assumed by Moghedien in order to slip in amongst Nynaeve's refugee women in Salidar. None save Nynaeve, Birgitte, Elayne, Leane, and Siuan know that the necklace she wears is actually an a'dam, a device used to control her so she cannot do the things Forsaken usually do. See also Jaril; Moghedien; Seve.
